statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT maintenance_type, equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_notes FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive';
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 1
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_notes FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY equipment_name
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id IN (2, 4, 6) AND maintenance_type = 'Emergency' ORDER BY equipment_id DESC
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%Routine%' AND maintenance_notes IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Check';
SELECT id, maintenance_date, scheduled_maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedules ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE equipment_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM maintenance_logs GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE equipment_id = 123;
SELECT id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedules ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total, equipment_id FROM maintenance_logs GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules JOIN maintenance_logs ON maintenance_schedules.equipment_id = maintenance_logs.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_logs WHERE equipment_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM technicians WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY technician_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT technician_id, technician_name, technician_email FROM technicians WHERE technician_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, equipment_id ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;

SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Corrective Maintenance' AND completed_by LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;

SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs INNER JOIN technicians ON maintenance_logs.technician_id = technicians.technician_id WHERE experience_years > 5 AND technician_email LIKE '%@company.com%' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(log_id) AS num_logs FROM maintenance_logs GROUP BY equipment_id ORDER BY num_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT eqp_name, eqp_type FROM equipment WHERE eqp_type = 'Printer';
SELECT eqp_id, eqp_name, purchase_date FROM equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_date, technician, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE technician = 'John Doe';
SELECT eqp_name, maintenance_description, duration_hours FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_history ON equipment.eqp_id = maintenance_history.eqp_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE eqp_type = 'Printer';
SELECT eqp_name, purchase_date FROM equipment WHERE eqp_type = 'Scanner' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE technician = 'John Doe' AND maintenance_description LIKE '%fault%';
SELECT eqp_name, purchase_date, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_schedules ON equipment.eqp_id = maintenance_schedules.eqp_id WHERE frequency = 'Monthly';
SELECT eqp_name, maintenance_date, duration_hours FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_history ON equipment.eqp_id = maintenance_history.eqp_id ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC, duration_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, maintenance_interval FROM Equipment ORDER BY maintenance_interval DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT technician_name, maintenance_date, description FROM MaintenanceLogs INNER JOIN Technicians ON MaintenanceLogs.technician_name = Technicians.technician_name;
SELECT * FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC, maintenance_interval ASC;

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, MaintenanceHistory.description, Technicians.technician_name FROM Equipment JOIN MaintenanceHistory ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceHistory.equipment_id JOIN Technicians ON MaintenanceHistory.technician_id = Technicians.technician_id WHERE MaintenanceHistory.maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, MaintenanceSchedules.maintenance_type, MaintenanceSchedules.status FROM Equipment LEFT JOIN MaintenanceSchedules ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceSchedules.equipment_id WHERE MaintenanceSchedules.status = 'scheduled';

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, MaintenanceLogs.description, Technicians.specialization FROM Equipment JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceLogs.equipment_id JOIN Technicians ON MaintenanceLogs.technician_name = Technicians.technician_name WHERE Technicians.experience_years > 5;

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, MaintenanceHistory.description, Technicians.technician_name FROM Equipment,nMaintenanceHistory, Technicians WHERE Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceHistory.equipment_id AND MaintenanceHistory.technician_id = Technicians.technician_id;
